TopicTitle: Engines not firing on staging trigger.

Articles.Content:
Argh, landing on Tylo, I start descent on nukes, fine, but I have a cluster of 4 aerospikes to trigger next, shortly before touchdown.

I hit stage, and the stage triggers, but the engines, they do nutting!

If I right click, I can activate, (but go into crazy spin as only one of 4 activated) and I don't have time to cut thrust and manual activate them all before lithobraking.

I did rearrange staging before descent. Any ideas? Using MJ.

Edited January 26, 2014 by SSSPutnik
Bug
Um, pictures? preferably with your staging visible would do wonders to help diagnose the problem. I assume since you can manually trigger one that fuel feed is not the problem.

Yeah, I think its MJ. If I do manual descent it works...

MJ triggers the stage but the engines stay off

Looks like manual it is !
Hmm... did you enable autostaging? It's in the "Utilities" section.
Have you fired the aerospikes before and then manually shut them down? IIRC staging wont activate them again. Action groups are what you need.

Yeah, they were activated by mistake briefly, hmm that could be it then.

Can't create action groups around Tylo orbit Next ship, definitely.

Yes, tried with and without auto stage.
Turns out its probably due to the engines being previously used, they won't auto trigger again apparently.

Can't create action groups around Tylo orbit

You could with this addon

You could with this addon

Or http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/61263
